sqlMap.sql:
FROM openmps.mp_order_upload a inner join mp_cust_info b on ( a.corp_code = b.corp_code and a.ordr_cust = b.cust_code ) where a.corp_code = #corpCode#
a.ordr_cust = #ordrCust#
